abstract: The Tribune Co. said Tuesday that it reached agreement with more parties to its bankruptcy as it tries to bring its publishing and broadcasting business out of Chapter 11.
snippet: The Tribune Co. said Tuesday that it reached agreement with more parties to its bankruptcy as it tries to bring its publishing and broadcasting business out of Chapter 11.
lead_paragraph: The Tribune Company said Tuesday that it reached agreement with more parties to its bankruptcy as it attemps to bring its publishing and broadcasting business out of Chapter 11, Reuters reports.

headline.main: JPMorgan Chase Agrees to Tribune Debt Deal

abstract: JPMorgan Chase on Wednesday announced a $4.4 billion profit for its third quarter, rising significantly over the same time last year as the firm cut its provisions against loan losses.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase on Wednesday announced a $4.4 billion profit for its third quarter, rising significantly over the same time last year as the firm cut its provisions against loan losses.
lead_paragraph: 8:15 a.m. | Updated The New York Times’s Eric Dash has more on JPMorgan’s earnings.

headline.main: JPMorgan Profits Jump 23% as Loss Reserves Fall

abstract: JPMorgan Chase kicked off what is expected to be a mixed quarterly earnings season for big banks.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase kicked off what is expected to be a mixed quarterly earnings season for big banks.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase kicked off what was expected to be a mixed quarterly earnings season for big banks on Wednesday with a 23 percent increase in third-quarter income.

headline.main: JPMorgan Chase Profit Rises as Loan Provisions Fall
headline.print_headline: JPMorgan Chase Profit Rises as Loan Provisions Fall

abstract: Lazard said that it hired Naguib Kheraj as a deputy chairman and senior executive in charge of international operations.
snippet: Lazard said that it hired Naguib Kheraj as a deputy chairman and senior executive in charge of international operations.
lead_paragraph: 2:42 p.m. | Updated Lazard said on Wednesday that it has hired Naguib Kheraj, the former chief executive of JPMorgan Cazenove, as a deputy chairman and a senior member of its financial advisory team.
